name: wykn-api
description: The project aims to deliver a functional mobile application that simplifies the process of managing electric bill payments for users, enhancing their convenience and overall experience. It involves both frontend and backend development, ensuring seamless interaction between the user interface and the underlying data and functionality.

scripts.start: npm install & npm run migrate & npm run start_server
scripts.prod_setup: npm run migrate & npm run start_server

author: Emmanuel Adenagbe
